title: Popular 'Car Talk' Co-Host Tom Magliozzi Dies At 77
teaser: Tom Magliozzi died on Monday of complications associated with Alzheimer's disease. Tom and his brother Ray were known as Click and Clack, the Tappet Brothers. Their specialty: cars and puns.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
